name: redux-ping
description: Reducers for Lightping and Tweetping interfaces

scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/watchify --verbose --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/main.js -- src/js/index.jsx | ./node_modules/.bin/exorcist public/main.js.map > public/main.js ./node_modules/.bin/watch './node_modules/.bin/lessc src/less/index.less public/styles.css' src/less/

author: Lightstream Company
